info.title: Unified Engagement API
info.description:
#### Introduction
Welcome to the Unified API (Engagement) documentation. You can use this API to write to multiple third-party providers within the Engagement category.

[View common schema for Engagement](https://docs.supaglue.com/platform/common-schemas/engagement)

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://www.postman.com/supaglue/workspace/supaglue-public/overview)

#### Base API URL

```
https://api.supaglue.io/engagement/v2
```

post.description: Send request directly to a provider

path.description: The path to send the request to (do not pass the domain)

query.description: Query parameters to pass to downstream

body.description: Body to pass to downstream (can be string or JSON object)

url.description: The full URL the request was went to

headers.description: The response headers from the downstream

post.description: Some providers do not support `primary` phone number type, in which case we will default to `mobile`. If both `primary` and `mobile` phone numbers are specified and only a single mobile number is possible, then `mobile` will be used and `primary` will be dropped.

tags.name: Contacts
tags.description: The `Contact` Common Object represents a "contact" in Engagements.

tags.name: Sequences
tags.description: The `Sequence` Common Object represents a "sequence" in Engagements.

tags.name: Sequence States
tags.description: The `Sequence State` Common Object represents the state of a contact in a sequence.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: The `User` Common Object represents a "user" in Engagements.

tags.name: Mailboxes
tags.description: The `Mailbox` Common Object is used to represent email mailbox, used within the application for sending and syncing emails

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: The `Account` Common Object represents a "company" or "account" in Engagements.

x-api-key.name: x-api-key
x-api-key.description: API key to allow developers to access the API

mailbox_id.description: The ID of the mailbox to use for the sequence. Required for Apollo and Outreach. Unused for Salesloft.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who is performing the action. Required for Salesloft, optional for Apollo, unused for Outreach.

type.description: The share type of the sequence. Setting to `team` will share with the whole team. `private` will only share with the owner.

name.description: The name given by the user for the step. Used by Salesloft only.

interval_seconds.description: The interval (in seconds) until this step will activate after the previous step (in case of first step, relative to when prospect first enters a sequence); only applicable to interval-based sequences. This is 0 by default

date.description: The date this step will activate; only applicable to date-based sequences.

template.description: The email/message template to be used for this step. Only applicable for email or message steps.

id.description: The ID of the template to use for this step.

name.description: The name of the template. In Outreach, if missing this will create an `invisible` template that doesn't show up in the templates list UI.

to.description: A list of default person and email address pairs to receive this template in the "to" field

cc.description: A list of default person and email address pairs to receive this template in the "cc" field

bcc.description: A list of default person and email address pairs to receive this template in the "bcc" field

is_reply.description: If true, this step will be sent as a reply to the previous step.

order.description: The step's display order within its sequence. Only applicable for Outreach when adding steps one at a time after the initial sequence creation, otherwise when creating steps together with sequence order is implicit based on the order of step within the step array. Salesloft does not use the `order` param, and order is instead determined by `interval_seconds` which translates into the `day` parameter

type.description: The type of the sequence state. Note: `linkedin_send_message` is undocumented in Outreach and subject to change.

task_note.description: An optional note to be attached to this step.

custom_fields.description: Custom properties to be inserted that are not covered by the common object. Object keys must match exactly to the corresponding provider API.

detail.description: The full error message from the remote Provider. The schema and level of detail will vary by Provider.
detail.example: {"code":400,"body":{"status":"error","message":"Property values were not valid: [{\\"isValid\\":false,\\"message\\":\\"Property \\\\\\"__about_us\\\\\\" does not exist\\",\\"error\\":\\"PROPERTY_DOESNT_EXIST\\",\\"name\\":\\"__about_us\\",\\"localizedErrorMessage\\":\\"Property \\\\\\"__about_us\\\\\\" does not exist\\"}]","correlationId":"ac94252c-90b5-45d2-ad1d-9a9f7651d7d2","category":"VALIDATION_ERROR"},"headers":{"access-control-allow-credentials":"false","cf-cache-status":"DYNAMIC","cf-ray":"8053d17b9dae9664-SJC","connection":"close","content-length":"361","content-type":"application/json;charset=utf-8","date":"Mon, 11 Sep 2023 23:51:22 GMT","nel":"{\\"success_fraction\\":0.01,\\"report_to\\":\\"cf-nel\\",\\"max_age\\":604800}","report-to":"{\\"endpoints\\":[{\\"url\\":\\"https://a.nel.cloudflare.com/report/v3?s=FgwuXObO%2Fz6ahUJKsxjDLaXTWjooJ8tB0w4%2B%2BKaulGStx0FGkn1PoJoOx2KrFMfihzNdfAqikq7CmgbdlmwKB8hkmp3eTb68qpg10LXFlRgiSqRhbWM7yYSfo8CXmPBc\\"}],\\"group\\":\\"cf-nel\\",\\"max_age\\":604800}","server":"cloudflare","strict-transport-security":"max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload","vary":"origin, Accept-Encoding","x-content-type-options":"nosniff","x-envoy-upstream-service-time":"91","x-evy-trace-listener":"listener_https","x-evy-trace-route-configuration":"listener_https/all","x-evy-trace-route-service-name":"envoyset-translator","x-evy-trace-served-by-pod":"iad02/hubapi-td/envoy-proxy-6c94986c56-9xsh2","x-evy-trace-virtual-host":"all","x-hubspot-correlation-id":"ac94252c-90b5-45d2-ad1d-9a9f7651d7d2","x-hubspot-ratelimit-interval-milliseconds":"10000","x-hubspot-ratelimit-max":"100","x-hubspot-ratelimit-remaining":"99","x-hubspot-ratelimit-secondly":"10","x-hubspot-ratelimit-secondly-remaining":"9","x-request-id":"ac94252c-90b5-45d2-ad1d-9a9f7651d7d2","x-trace":"2B1B4386362759B6A4C34802AD168B803DDC1BE770000000000000000000"}}

problem_type.description: The Supaglue error code associated with the error.

title.description: A brief description of the error. The schema and type of message will vary by Provider.

example.detail: {"code":400,"body":{"status":"error","message":"Property values were not valid: [{\\"isValid\\":false,\\"message\\":\\"Property \\\\\\"__about_us\\\\\\" does not exist\\",\\"error\\":\\"PROPERTY_DOESNT_EXIST\\",\\"name\\":\\"__about_us\\",\\"localizedErrorMessage\\":\\"Property \\\\\\"__about_us\\\\\\" does not exist\\"}]","correlationId":"ac94252c-90b5-45d2-ad1d-9a9f7651d7d2","category":"VALIDATION_ERROR"},"headers":{"access-control-allow-credentials":"false","cf-cache-status":"DYNAMIC","cf-ray":"8053d17b9dae9664-SJC","connection":"close","content-length":"361","content-type":"application/json;charset=utf-8","date":"Mon, 11 Sep 2023 23:51:22 GMT","nel":"{\\"success_fraction\\":0.01,\\"report_to\\":\\"cf-nel\\",\\"max_age\\":604800}","report-to":"{\\"endpoints\\":[{\\"url\\":\\"https://a.nel.cloudflare.com/report/v3?s=FgwuXObO%2Fz6ahUJKsxjDLaXTWjooJ8tB0w4%2B%2BKaulGStx0FGkn1PoJoOx2KrFMfihzNdfAqikq7CmgbdlmwKB8hkmp3eTb68qpg10LXFlRgiSqRhbWM7yYSfo8CXmPBc\\"}],\\"group\\":\\"cf-nel\\",\\"max_age\\":604800}","server":"cloudflare","strict-transport-security":"max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload","vary":"origin, Accept-Encoding","x-content-type-options":"nosniff","x-envoy-upstream-service-time":"91","x-evy-trace-listener":"listener_https","x-evy-trace-route-configuration":"listener_https/all","x-evy-trace-route-service-name":"envoyset-translator","x-evy-trace-served-by-pod":"iad02/hubapi-td/envoy-proxy-6c94986c56-9xsh2","x-evy-trace-virtual-host":"all","x-hubspot-correlation-id":"ac94252c-90b5-45d2-ad1d-9a9f7651d7d2","x-hubspot-ratelimit-interval-milliseconds":"10000","x-hubspot-ratelimit-max":"100","x-hubspot-ratelimit-remaining":"99","x-hubspot-ratelimit-secondly":"10","x-hubspot-ratelimit-secondly-remaining":"9","x-request-id":"ac94252c-90b5-45d2-ad1d-9a9f7651d7d2","x-trace":"2B1B4386362759B6A4C34802AD168B803DDC1BE770000000000000000000"}}
example.title: Property values were not valid

include_deleted_data.name: include_deleted_data
include_deleted_data.description: Whether to include data that was deleted in providers.

include_raw_data.name: include_raw_data
include_raw_data.description: Whether to include raw data fetched from the 3rd party provider.

created_after.name: created_after
created_after.description: If provided, will only return objects created after this datetime

created_before.name: created_before
created_before.description: If provided, will only return objects created before this datetime

modified_after.name: modified_after
modified_after.description: If provided, will only return objects modified after this datetime

modified_before.name: modified_before
modified_before.description: If provided, will only return objects modified before this datetime

page_size.name: page_size
page_size.description: Number of results to return per page. (Max: 1000)

x-customer-id.name: x-customer-id
x-customer-id.description: The customer ID that uniquely identifies the customer in your application
